Package net.finmath.smartcontract.product.xml

Class ReturnSwapAmount

java.lang.Object
net.finmath.smartcontract.product.xml.LegAmount
net.finmath.smartcontract.product.xml.ReturnSwapAmount
public class ReturnSwapAmount extends LegAmount
Specifies, in relation to each Payment Date, the amount to which the Payment Date relates. For Equity Swaps this element is equivalent to the Equity Amount term as defined in the ISDA 2002 Equity Derivatives Definitions.

Java class for ReturnSwapAmount complex type.

The following schema fragment specifies the expected content contained within this class. 

 <complexType name="ReturnSwapAmount">
   <complexContent>
     <extension base="{http://www.fpml.org/FpML-5/confirmation}LegAmount">
       <sequence>
         <element name="cashSettlement" type="{http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema}boolean"/>
         <group ref="{http://www.fpml.org/FpML-5/confirmation}Dividends.model"/>
       </sequence>
     </extension>
   </complexContent>
 </complexType>
